این ضریب مشخص کننده میزان جریمه ایست که: This coefficient indicates the amount of fines awarded to the visitor for returning from sale. For example, if the visitor is not going to receive a pursant for a sale that has resulted in a return from sale, you should put this coefficient at 1, or if you want to penalize him, put the coefficient equal to 2.
ین ضریب مشخص کننده درصد پورسانت اضافی پر: This coefficient indicates the percentage of additional pursant paid to the visitor for the first customer invoice. For example, if the visitor is going to receive twice as much pursant for the first sale to a customer, you should put this coefficient at 1.
این ضریب مشخص کننده میزان جریمه ایست که: This coefficient indicates the amount of fines awarded to the visitor for returning from the distribution of an order. For example, if the visitor is not going to receive a pursant for an order that has resulted in the return of the distribution, you should put this coefficient at 1, or if you want to penalize him, put the coefficient equal to 2.
